author: ghugo83
body:
Since the merging of SpecPars with same name can create issues in results, also put different SpecPar names in last occurrence: ZDC.
See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32540/files 

This PR has no impact on perf (small number of paths and no regex), but avoid/fix possible issues in results with DD4hep.
title: Also fix SpecPars names in ZDC
